body:
Github has now marked some of my comments as outdated, but it's not really clear to me why...

Anyway, re:  https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/919/commits/4bbf9df5cd70339c87ef7a6789ddc7a4d4edee3a, I'm struggling with the commit message. I kind of assume that cloning isn't important as long as we *do* use the error message *before* the sandbox gets nuked, but that seems to be the opposite of what the commit message says. Maybe I'm misunderstanding what that change is about?
body_text:

Anyway, re:  4bbf9df, I'm struggling with the commit message. I kind of assume that cloning isn't important as long as we do use the error message before the sandbox gets nuked, but that seems to be the opposite of what the commit message says. Maybe I'm misunderstanding what that change is about?
body_html:
Github has now marked some of my comments as outdated, but it's not really clear to me why...

Anyway, re: 4bbf9df, I'm struggling with the commit message. I kind of assume that cloning isn't important as long as we do use the error message before the sandbox gets nuked, but that seems to be the opposite of what the commit message says. Maybe I'm misunderstanding what that change is about?
